column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ According to the National Police
column5: police detained 2 suspects for attempted theft and possession of a weapon on Street 598
column7: Khan Sen Sok.------Two suspects are:------1- Chin Thang------2 – Chang Thale
column8: both 30 years old and Vietnamese nationals. Both tested negative for drug use.------One revolver
column9: three bullets and a motorcycle were seized.------The suspects are currently being detained at the Sen Sok district police headquarters to follow the legal procedures. ------POST NEWS
